hero.title: About Voxly
hero.text: We're building the future of language learning — voice-first, AI-powered, and totally Gen Z.

community.title: 100+ Collaborators shaping the future of language learning
community.text: Join a global community of language lovers, AI enthusiasts, and fluency chasers. We're building something fresh together.

mission.title: Make fluency accessible, fun, and real

fact.title: of learners feel confident speaking after just 3 months
fact.text_1: Real conversations from day one, powered by AI that adapts to you

mission.text: We believe everyone deserves to speak another language with confidence. No boring textbooks, no outdated methods — just real conversations, instant feedback, and results that actually stick.

list.title: Real conversations, real skills
list.text: Practice speaking from day one. No more 'textbook speak' that nobody actually uses.

list.title: AI that gets you
list.text: Our AI adapts to your level, your pace, and your learning style.

list.title: Fluency that lasts
list.text: Learn smart, not hard. Our method is designed for real-world results.

careers.title: Build the future of language learning
careers.text: We're looking for passionate people who want to make a real impact on how the world learns languages.
